ygData.subject: Re: Re: Exp loss for dying
ygData.msgSnippet: This is not correct - in that I just died in level 31 - and lost just over a half-bubble.  I m not denying anyone s claims that they lost a full bubble - just
ygData.messageBody:
This is not correct - in that I just died in level 31 - and lost just over a
half-bubble. I'm not denying anyone's claims that they lost a full bubble -
just that the implication that it happens every time.. Sure seems that
there is a random component to it...

Slyde 31 Bard of Xegony

----- Original Message -----
From: Dave Gaines <dave@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, January 04, 2000 8:04 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Exp loss for dying


> From: Dave Gaines <dave@...>
>
> Levels after hell levels (31, 36, 41, 46) are the levels you lose a
> whole bubble of xp.
>
> I only experienced this at level 46th. A friend did at 31.
> Don't die at these levels.
>
>
